item.title: People
item.description: Active Transport Futures is, from left to right in the picture, Mark Padgham Department of Geoinformatics at the University of Salzburg, Austria. Robin Lovelace Insitute for Transport Studies and the Leeds Institute for Data Analytics, both at Leeds University, U.K.
